feed.title: VictoriaMetrics Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for VictoriaMetrics: v1.102.20
entry.content:
v1.102.20

Released at 2025-05-09

Known issues: vmagent in this release is affected by #8941. The -remoteWrite.relabelConfig and -remoteWrite.urlRelabelConfig flags are not applied properly, causing the relabeling logic to be skipped. Update to v1.102.21 or rollback to v1.102.19 instead.

v1.102.x is a line of LTS releases. It contains important up-to-date bugfixes for VictoriaMetrics enterprise. All these fixes are also included in the latest community release. The v1.102.x line will be supported for at least 12 months since v1.102.0 release

  • SECURITY: upgrade Go builder from Go1.23.8 to Go1.23.9. See the list of issues addressed in Go1.23.9

  • BUGFIX: vmalert-tool: fix parsing for (+/-)Inf values and scientific notation in values field. Thanks to @evkuzin for #8847.

  • BUGFIX: vmsingle and vmagent: create relabel config reload and stream aggregation config reload related metrics only if config is present. See helm-charts#2119 for details.

entry.title: New release for VictoriaMetrics: v1.110.7
entry.content:
v1.110.7

Released at 2025-05-09

Known issues: vmagent in this release is affected by #8941. The -remoteWrite.relabelConfig and -remoteWrite.urlRelabelConfig flags are not applied properly, causing the relabeling logic to be skipped. Update to v1.110.8 or rollback to v1.110.6 instead.

v1.110.x is a line of LTS releases. It contains important up-to-date bugfixes for VictoriaMetrics enterprise. All these fixes are also included in the latest community release. The v1.110.x line will be supported for at least 12 months since v1.110.0 release

  • BUGFIX: MetricsQL: properly parse quoted utf-8 label names in parentheses. See #8826 for details.
  • BUGFIX: MetricsQL: properly parse metric name series selectors with or expressions. See metricsql#50 for details.
  • BUGFIX: vmalert-tool: fix parsing for (+/-)Inf values and scientific notation in values field. Thanks to @evkuzin for #8847.
  • BUGFIX: vmsingle and vmagent: create relabel config reload and stream aggregation config reload related metrics only if config is present. See helm-charts#2119 for details.

entry.title: New release for VictoriaMetrics: v1.102.21
entry.content:
v1.102.21

Released at 2025-05-15

v1.102.x is a line of LTS releases. It contains important up-to-date bugfixes for VictoriaMetrics enterprise. All these fixes are also included in the latest community release. The v1.102.x line will be supported for at least 12 months since v1.102.0 release

  • BUGFIX: vmsingle, vminsert in VictoriaMetrics cluster and vmagent: fixed duplication in Datadog sketches aggregation metrics. See #8836 for details.
  • BUGFIX: vmagent: properly initialize relabel config reloading metrics for -remoteWrite.relabelConfig and -remoteWrite.urlRelabelConfig flags. Bug was introduced in v1.117.0. And back-ported to the v1.110.7 and [v1.102.20](https://github.com/VictoriaMet
  • BUGFIX: vmagent: properly reload authorization configuration on headers changes. See This issue for details. Thanks to @smallpath for the PR.

entry.title: New release for VictoriaMetrics: v1.110.8
entry.content:
v1.110.8

Released at 2025-05-15

v1.110.x is a line of LTS releases. It contains important up-to-date bugfixes for VictoriaMetrics enterprise. All these fixes are also included in the latest community release. The v1.110.x line will be supported for at least 12 months since v1.110.0 release

  • BUGFIX: vmsingle, vminsert in VictoriaMetrics cluster and vmagent: fixed duplication in Datadog sketches aggregation metrics. See #8836 for details.
  • BUGFIX: vmagent: properly initialize relabel config reloading metrics for -remoteWrite.relabelConfig and -remoteWrite.urlRelabelConfig flags. Bug was introduced in v1.117.0. And back-ported to the v1.110.7 and v1.102.20 versions.
  • BUGFIX: vmagent: properly reload authorization configuration on headers changes. See This issue for details. Thanks to @smallpath for the PR.

entry.title: New release for VictoriaMetrics: v1.117.1
entry.content:
v1.117.1

Released at 2025-05-15

Update Note 1: latest and stable tags for docker images will no longer be updated. It is required to use specific version tags for docker images to continue receiving updates. See #7336 for details.

  • BUGFIX: vmsingle, vminsert in VictoriaMetrics cluster and vmagent: fixed duplication in Datadog sketches aggregation metrics. See this issue for details.
  • BUGFIX: vmagent: properly initialize relabel config reloading metrics for -remoteWrite.relabelConfig and -remoteWrite.urlRelabelConfig flags. Bug was introduced in v1.117.0. And back-ported to the v1.110.7 and v1.102.20 versions.
  • BUGFIX: vmagent: properly reload authorization configuration on headers changes. See This issue for details. Thanks to @smallpath for the PR.
